SEARCH
Module com.example.thenotelobster
Package com.example.thenotelobster.model.QuizClasses

Class QuizDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.thenotelobster.model.QuizClasses.QuizDAO
public class QuizDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing quiz data including creation, retrieval, and deletion of quizzes and their questions from the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    QuizDAO()
    Constructs a new QuizDAO and establishes a database connection.

  • Constructor Details

    • QuizDAO

      public QuizDAO()
      Constructs a new QuizDAO and establishes a database connection.

  • Method Details

    • insertQuiz

      public int insertQuiz(QuizResponse quiz, int noteId) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new quiz into the database.
      Parameters:
      quiz - The quiz object to be inserted
      noteId - The note ID associated with the quiz
      Returns:
      The generated quiz ID, or -1 if the insertion fails
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • insertQuestions

      public void insertQuestions(int quizId, List<QuizMultipleChoiceQuestion> questions) throws SQLException
      Inserts a list of multiple-choice questions for a specific quiz.
      Parameters:
      quizId - The ID of the quiz to associate the questions with
      questions - The list of questions to insert
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • save

      public int save(QuizResponse quiz, int noteId) throws SQLException
      Saves a quiz and its associated questions as a transaction.
      Parameters:
      quiz - The quiz object to save
      noteId - The note ID associated with the quiz
      Returns:
      The generated quiz ID if successful
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or rollback is triggered

    • loadQuiz

      public QuizResponse loadQuiz(int quizId) throws SQLException
      Loads a quiz and its associated questions by quiz ID.
      Parameters:
      quizId - The ID of the quiz to load
      Returns:
      A populated QuizResponse object
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • getAllQuizzesForCurrentUser

      public List<QuizResponse> getAllQuizzesForCurrentUser() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all quizzes created by the currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      A list of QuizResponse objects
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • getQuizByTitle

      public QuizResponse getQuizByTitle(String title) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a quiz by its title for the currently logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the quiz
      Returns:
      A populated QuizResponse object, or null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • getQuizIdByTitle

      public int getQuizIdByTitle(String title, String userEmail) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the quiz ID by title and user email.
      Parameters:
      title - The quiz title
      userEmail - The email of the quiz owner
      Returns:
      The quiz ID, or -1 if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • deleteQuiz

      public void deleteQuiz(int quizId) throws SQLException
      Deletes a quiz and its associated questions from the database.
      Parameters:
      quizId - The ID of the quiz to delete
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs
